com.tambapps.gmage.blur

Class PixelationBlur

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tambapps.gmage.blur.PixelationBlur
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blur

    public class PixelationBlur
extends Object
implements Blur
    Implementation of a pixelation effect blur

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Gmage apply(Gmage gmage)
      Apply on a new gmage this blur
      void applyOn(Gmage gmage)
      Apply directly the blur on the supplied gmage Note that not all Blur supports this operation
      void applyOn(Gmage gmage, Region region)
      Apply directly the blur on the supplied gmage, in the given region Note that not all Blur supports this operation
